name: Hell Hunt Zenva FPS Free
description:
Hey, You are a Hunter famous for blasting Zombies and put them back to hell. A Zombie creak has broken into a secret research facility

HUNTER, you will kill zombie or turn into a zombie. Go Hunt

Controls

Shoot: Mouse-Left

Reload: Mouse-right

Download FULL version of this game with hard exciting action-packed levels at https://mr-mozaic.itch.io/zombie-hell-hunt-fps
